channel.title: Project Misc [OldSchool][Unique]
channel.description:
[center][b][size=18pt]Project Misc[/size][/b]
[b][url=https://twitter.com/ProjectMisc]Twitter[/url][/b]
[b]What is Project Misc?[/b] Project Misc is a very unique oldschool PvP server.
[b]PvP[/b] PvP takes place at our home in Miscellania. Whenever you kill another player, a completely random item is dropped, sequentially making every item in the game a "rare". You also recieve 5-20 of a random potion, arrow, food, or rune. You [u]do not[/u] lose carried items on death.
[b]Dueling[/b] While in the safe zone at Miscellania, you can duel other players - this allows easy access for staking items.
[b]Starting Out[/b] Upon starting the game, no starter items are given - this is to help preserve the main idea of every item being "rare".
[b]Training[/b] Training of combat skills is done through objects. Dummys are used for melee exp, targets are used for ranged exp, and elemental balances are used for magic exp. These can all be found at our home.
[u]If you have any questions about gameplay please feel free to ask.[/u]
[b]Media:[/b]
[IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee365/ZBradleyX/randomdropspjm.png[/img]

lol? everything that’s been listen, or said, about this server is incredibly basic additions.

Check it out and you can see the idea behind it. We aren’t supporting the screenshot of an interface, we’re supporting the idea and progress. I’m sure you already know this, so y u no edit post?
[/quote]progress on basic additions? that’s all i see.

This thread was made 1 day ago, I’m sure Holy will update it.[/quote]hopefully it’ll be something good [i doubt it, i’ve seen his work].

Read full topic
